name: Hyper Crimson
description:
Hyper Crimson.

All pilots to their battle stations! Launch from the safety of the mothership in your retro, state-of-the-art space fighter: The Skull armada has arrived!

Take to the stars in Hyper Crimson; a fast paced easy to play, hard to master retro arcade space shooter inspired by the classic Asteroids.

TWO BUTTON CONTROLS
Take control of your ship with easy auto-flying mechanics. Activate left and right boosters via tapping the respective sides of your device. Activate both sides to boost, producing an increase of speed and temporary protective shield. Scan the stars with your crosshairs, blasting your way through waves of foes.

QUICK FIRE ROUNDS
As easy as Hyper Crimson is to play you will not survive! Quick fire deployment allows another ship to light jump right back into the action, recharging lasers ready for the next run of exploding red space matter.

MAINTAIN POWER
Charge laser cannons and auto deploy heat seeking missiles. Evaporate asteroids with high-powered lasers and wipe the stars clean with ultimate overload. Control your power band for maximum eliminations before systems go critical.

HIGH SCORE
What can a single ship do against such an onslaught? Only time and a high score counter can tell. Chase your personal best and discover the growing threats that emerge from each moment spent in flight.

Find yourself chasing the next explosion in Hyper Crimson.


Music provided by El Kirpitch: https://icons8.com/music/author/el-kirpitch
